entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 10:19 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.3°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -20.4°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
